PRESENT_ILLNESS_CONTENTS: This 59-year-old male patient had history of 1) L4/5 moderate stenosis, right side S/P laminectomy, right side on 2017/02/15 2) C3/4, C4/5, C5/6  Herniated intervertebral disc with cord compression S/P C3/4, C4/5 ACDF on 2017/03/24 3) L3/4, L4/5 stenosis with thecal sac and nerve roots compression S/P laminectomy on 2017/09/21.                                   This time, he has been bothered by right neck pain and extend to right chest , so he visited our emergency unit on 4/07, where serial exam including hemogram & bichemistry panel was performed, which report as following showed:WBC:5.77 10^3/uL Hb:11.0 g/dL PLT:386 10^3/uL Glucose AC:169 mg/dl Cr:0.8 mg/dl ALT:19 U/L Na/K:137/3.6 mEq/L CRP: 26.5 mg/L noted. Pre- and post-contrast-enhanced CT scan of head and chest revealed: RUL lung cancer, with bilateral lung-to-lung metastasis and metastatic lymphadenopathy. Preliminary staging: T4N3M1a (AJCC 8th Ed, 2016). Explanation to patienet .So we were arrange admitted to our ward for lung biopsy.   ＜Past history＞  DM(+), HTN(+), Heart disease(-), CVA history(-), COPD(-),   ＜Personal history＞  *Smoking(+)/ 已戒2年  *Alcohol comsumption(-)  *Betel nut chewing(+)/ 已戒2年  *Drug or food allergy: denied  ＜Travel or animal contact history＞: denied  ＜Operateion history＞:  1) L4/5 moderate stenosis, right side S/P laminectomy, right side on 2017/02/15  2) C3/4, C4/5, C5/6  Herniated intervertebral disc with cord compression S/P C3/4, C4/5 ACDF on 2017/03/24 3) L3/4, L4/5 stenosis with thecal sac and nerve  roots compression S/P laminectomy on 2017/09/21.                                   ＜Family history＞  DM, HTN, Heart disease, CVA history, COPD-. SPECIFIC_EXAMINATION_CONTENTS: ◆報告類別：骨骼肌肉系統  Chief complain & past history: RUL lung cancer, with bilateral lung-to-lung metastasis and metastatic  lymphadenopathy. Preliminary staging: T4N3M1a (AJCC 8th Ed, 2016).   Image finding: The Tc-99m MDP whole body bone scan revealed no definite evidence of bone  metastasis.  Impression & suggestion: 1) No definite evidence of bone metastasis was demonstrated. 2) Follow up examination is recommended  報告者：DAI19-林明賢 核醫專科42號 申請日：1080417 報告時間：1080419 0851
PATHOLOGY_REPORT_NAME: 12.病理報告(包括病理發現)(Pathological Reports)
PATHOLOGY_REPORT_CONTENTS: ◆報告類別：病理組織檢驗  Pathological diagnosis: Lung, right, CT-guided biopsy,--- adenocarcinoma Immunohistochemical study: CK7: diffuse strong positive TTF-1: few cells positive ALK, p40: negative  Gross: The specimen submitted consists of five tissue fragments measuring up to 1 x 0.1 x 0.1 cm. in size, fixed in formalin.   Grossly, they are tan, soft and cord like.   All for section.   Microscopically, it shows a picture of non-small cell carcinoma arranged in solid nest pattern infiltrated in the fibrotic stroma or filled in the alveolar space. The tumor cells have large nuclei and prominent nucleoli. Immunohistochemical study shows the tumor is diffuse strong positive for CK7, focal positive for TTF-1; negative for ALK, p40. If there is no other primary site considered, it is consistent with a lung adenocarcinoma.  報告者：DAL51-彭惠琴 病解專醫字第000342號 申請日：1080415 報告時間：1080418 1652   ◆報告類別：病理組織檢驗  Pathological diagnosis: Lung, right, CT-guided biopsy,--- adenocarcinoma Immunohistochemical study: CK7: diffuse strong positive TTF-1: few cells positive ALK, p40: negative  Gross: The specimen submitted consists of five tissue fragments measuring up to 1 x 0.1 x 0.1 cm. in size, fixed in formalin.   Grossly, they are tan, soft and cord like.   All for section.   Microscopically, it shows a picture of non-small cell carcinoma arranged in solid nest pattern infiltrated in the fibrotic stroma or filled in the alveolar space. The tumor cells have large nuclei and prominent nucleoli. Immunohistochemical study shows the tumor is diffuse strong positive for CK7, focal positive for TTF-1; negative for ALK, p40. If there is no other primary site considered, it is consistent with a lung adenocarcinoma.  報告者：DAL51-彭惠琴 病解專醫字第000342號 申請日：1080417 報告時間：1080418 1652   ◆報告類別：非婦科細胞學檢查  cytological diagnosis:       lung aspiration, right side,--- atypical cellular change conclusive for malignancy       many atypical cells with enlarged, hyperchromatic nuclei in nest pattern present  報告者：DAL51-彭惠琴 病解專醫字第000342號 申請日：1080415 報告時間：1080417 1440
SURGICAL_METHOD_AND_FINDING_NAME: 6.手術日期及方法(Operation Date and Procedures)
HOSPITAL_COURSE_CONTENTS: After admission, routine in ward was performed. C-T guided biopsy done on 4/16. Pathological diagnosis:adenocarcinoma, Immunohistochemical study:CK7: diffuse strong positive TTF-1: few cells positive ALK, p40: negative. The Tc-99m MDP whole body bone scan revealed no definite evidence of bone metastasis. Keep current medications for symptomatic treatment. This time,stable condition then discharge & follow up at out-patient department.
